mapper.select:
select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes, sum(notoilNumber) notOilNumber,sum(notoilMoney) notoilMoney,sum(notoilMoney)/sum(notoilNumber) avgMoney
from res_notoil
from res_notoil_vip
stationID IN
#{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1

select
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y') as name, sum(rn.notoilMoney) from res_notoil rn left join res_oil ro on rn.stationID=ro.stationID and
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')==DATE_FORMAT(ro.minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H') ==DATE_FORMAT(ro.minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')== DATE_FORMAT(ro.minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y-%m')== DATE_FORMAT(ro.minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y')== DATE_FORMAT(ro.minutes,'%Y')
rn.stationID IN
#{item}
and
rn.minutes >=DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and rn.minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1

select
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y') as name, sum(rn.notoilMoney) from res_notoil rn left join res_oil ro on rn.stationID=ro.stationID and
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')==DATE_FORMAT(ro.minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H') ==DATE_FORMAT(ro.minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')== DATE_FORMAT(ro.minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y-%m')== DATE_FORMAT(ro.minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(rn.minutes,'%Y')== DATE_FORMAT(ro.minutes,'%Y')
rn.stationID IN
#{item}
and
rn.minutes >=DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and rn.minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1

select notOil.minutes,notOil.notOilNumber,notOil.avgMoney,notOil.notOilMoney, vipNotOil.notOilNumber vipNotOilNumber,vipNotOil.notOilMoney vipNotOilMoney,vipNotOil.avgMoney vipavgMoney from(select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes, sum(notoilNumber) notOilNumber,sum(notoilMoney) notoilMoney,sum(notoilMoney)/sum(notoilNumber) avgMoney
from res_notoil
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1) notOil left join (select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes, sum(notoilNumber) notOilNumber,sum(notoilMoney) notoilMoney,sum(notoilMoney)/sum(notoilNumber) avgMoney from res_notoil_vip
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes <DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1) vipNotOil on notOil.minutes=vipNotOil.minutes order by notOil.minutes asc

select except.minutes,except.value money,vipExcept.value vipMoney from (select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes, sum(itemValue)/sum(dealNum) as value from res_exceptLube
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1) except left join (select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes, sum(itemValue)/sum(dealNum) as value from res_exceptLube_vip
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1) vipExcept on except.minutes=vipExcept.minutes order by except.minutes asc

select
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes, sum(departmentMoney) notoilMoney
from res_notoilDepartment
from res_notoilDepartment_vip
stationID IN #{item}
and
departmentName=#{departmentName} and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1,departmentName
group by 1

select DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d %H')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(minutes,'%Y') as minutes,sum(instoreMoney) instoreMoney,sum(fastfoodMoney) fastfoodMoney,sum(perishableMoney) perishableMoney,sum(lubeMoney) lubeMoney, sum(cigaretteMoney) cigaretteMoney,sum(dailyMoney) dailyMoney,sum(teamcardMoney) teamcardMoney,sum(alcoholicMoney) alcoholicMoney, sum(snackMoney) snackMoney,sum(nonalcoholicMoney) nonalcoholicMoney,sum(nonfoodMoney) nonfoodMoney
from res_notoilDepartmentb
from res_notoilDepartmentb_vip
station_id IN #{item}
and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1

select
DATE_FORMAT(hours,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(hours,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(hours,'%Y') as minutes, sum(notoilNumber)/sum(allNumber) avgMoney
from res_notoilRate
from res_notoilRate_vip
stationID IN #{item}
and
hours >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H') and hours < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H')
group by 1

select top10 name,sum(money) value
from res_notoilTop
from res_notoilTop_vip
stationID IN #{item}
and
minutes between DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by productCode order by sum(money) desc limit 10

select sum(departmentMoney) notOilMoney,sum(departmentNumber) notOilNumber,sum(departmentMoney)/sum(departmentNumber) avgMoney
from res_notoilDepartment
from res_notoilDepartment_vip
stationID IN #{item}
and
departmentName=#{departmentName} and
minutes >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and minutes < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')

select sum(notoilNumber)/sum(allNumber)
from res_notoilRate ran left join station on ran.stationID=station.id left join tag_station st
on station.id=st.stationId left join tag on st.tagId=tag.id left join category on
station.categoryId=category.id
where
ran.stationID=#{station} and
category.id=#{station} and
tag_station.tagId=#{station} and
ran.hours >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H') and ran.hours < DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H')

select
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(days,'%Y') as name,sum(sellMoney) value
from res_notoilSearch
station_id IN #{item}
and
product_code=#{productCode} and
days between DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by 1 order by 1 asc
